# firewallamsp_devices (Data Source)

Example data source



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `filter_box` (String) Filter Devices by Box GID
- `filter_group` (String) Filter Devices by Group

### Read-Only

- `device` (Attributes List) List of Boxes (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--device))

<a id="nestedatt--device"></a>
### Nested Schema for `device`

Read-Only:

- `gid` (String)
- `id` (String)
- `ip` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `online` (Boolean)
